title: about
text:
Hello, my name is Rafa, and this is the sin-pepperoni blog.
I started off as an electrical engineer, then deep-dived into math and optimization to tackle questions about electrical power systems, and eventually earned an MSc in operations research and data science.
Since then, I’ve been collaborating as a data scientist, putting questions at the heart of my work, and leveraging the toolbox I’ve gathered along my journey to answer them.
Feel free to connect and thank you for reading!

title: Welcome to the blog
text: Welcome to my blog and i hope to have a running version soon.

title: sin pepperoni
text:
[Work in progress!]
Exploring curiosity is like ordering a pizza without pepperoni —it’s about embracing different flavors and trying new things.
Just as a pizza without pepperoni opens up a world of possibilities, staying curious opens doors to endless discoveries and adventures.
